title: Determinants of environmental changes in human-modified ecosystems: Effects of plastics on moisture gradients, nutrients, and clay properties
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Jean Claude Ndayishimiye, Jacqueline Nyirajana, Pascaline Nyirabuhoro, Patrick Irakoze Nacumuyiki, Akinwale Oladotun Coker, Folake Olubunmi Akintayo, Yuri Mazei, Damir Saldaev, François Nkinahamira, Théogène Habumugisha, Theophile Murwanashyaka, Valens Hishamunda
